messages.message: Hello Germany! Typically I find that we two powers tend to have a stance of mutual neutrality with one another, and I'm happy to not go against the grain here.
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Hello Germany! Typically I find that we two powers tend to have a stance of mutual neutrality with one another, and I'm happy to not go against the grain here.'.

messages.message: I don't have an intention of moving to Tyrolia or anywhere near Munich at any time in the near future, if ever! So I'd like to hear that you have a similar mentality towards our relationship.
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'I don't have an intention of moving to Tyrolia or anywhere near Munich at any time in the near future, if ever! So I'd like to hear that you have a similar mentality towards our relationship.'.

messages.message: Keep Tyr and Boh clear and I'm content with mutual neutrality
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'Keep Tyr and Boh clear and I'm content with mutual neutrality'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Germany's response aligns with your previous declaration of intentions for mutual neutrality and specifies clear areas to keep clear, indicating a willingness to maintain peaceful relations and respect boundaries.

messages.message: Good to hear. Hope we can persuade Italy to do the same!
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Good to hear. Hope we can persuade Italy to do the same!'.

messages.output: You should be cautious and not entirely trust the message. Germany's use of the eyes emoji could indicate suspicion or a need for further information, potentially suggesting a level of uncertainty or monitoring of the situation. It may be wise to clarify your intentions or observe their future actions to gauge their stance more accurately.

messages.message: Hey, it looked like you weren't playing the game. I was just trying to look into getting the centers of an afk player before someone else did.
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Hey, it looked like you weren't playing the game. I was just trying to look into getting the centers of an afk player before someone else did.'.

messages.message: Yeah, some stuff came up and I missed the first turn. I am playing though.
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'Yeah, some stuff came up and I missed the first turn. I am playing though.'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Germany's explanation of missing the first turn due to personal reasons and confirming their commitment to playing indicates transparency and a genuine involvement in the game, suggesting a reliable and honest communication from their end.

messages.message: All right good to know. I can back off then
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'All right good to know. I can back off then'.
